text.tspan: * low flexibility, difficult to adapt to custom necessities
* doesn't scale much in the long run
* performances aren't the best in all of its aspects
* supports different ORMs and template systems
* not as easy as Django, but a far better compromise

* medium learning curve (very low at the beginning,
it takes longer to get well into its detailed features)
* completely flexible, everything is up to the coder
